column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=My friends birthday was tomorrow and I wanted to do something special for her .
#text=Aside from just getting her a gift I decided to make her a special cake .
#text=This cake was going to be shaped like a heart and it would be chocolate , her favorite flavor .
#text=I headed to the grocery store to get my ingredients .
#text=I got butter , unsweetened chocolate , sugar , eggs , flour , baking soda , salt , milk , and vinegar .
#text=I was making a devil 's food cake , something simple and yet elegant .
#text=When I got home I preheated the oven to 350 degrees F and I grease up my pans , I was going to be working hard tonight .
#text=I then melted 1\/2 cup of butter and 1 ounce of chocolate in a small pan , once it had melted I set it aside to cool down .
#text=Next I mixed 2 eggs with 2 cups of white sugar and I added the chocolate mixture .
#text=After that I added 1 cup of boiled water and I made sure to blend it well , the mixture was very liquid like , just like it needed to be .
#text=After that I mixed in my 2 1\/4 cups of flour , 1 1\/2 teaspoons of baking soda , and 1\/4 teaspoons of salt .
#text=I am really the best boyfriend in the world .
#text=After that I mixed in 1 teaspoon of vinegar and 1\/4 cup of milk to the main mixture .
#text=The main process was done all I needed to do was to bake it for 30 minutes , cut it into shape , and frost the cake .
#text=Her birthday tomorrow was going to be very special .
